ask_grok.description: Send prompts to Grok with real-time search, tools, and structured outputs.

props.name: messages
props.description: Conversation messages for multi-turn conversations.

props.name: content
props.description: Message content (text, image URL, or JSON for multimodal).

props.name: name
props.description: Unique identifier for the user.

props.name: tool_call_id
props.description: Required when role is "tool" - ID from the tool call.

props.name: quickPrompt
props.description: Simple text prompt for single-turn conversations. Ignored if Messages is provided.

props.name: systemMessage
props.description: System message to set behavior and context.

props.name: imageUrl
props.description: Image URL for vision models. Works with quick prompt mode.

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: Output format for the response.

props.name: jsonSchema
props.description: JSON schema for structured output (when response format is json_schema).

props.name: enableRealTimeSearch
props.description: Allow Grok to search the web and X for current information.

props.name: searchMode
props.description: How to handle real-time data search.

props.name: maxSearchResults
props.description: Maximum number of search results to use (1-30).

props.name: searchSources
props.description: Sources to search in.

props.name: tools
props.description: Functions the model can call.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the function.

props.name: description
props.description: What the function does.

props.name: parameters
props.description: JSON schema defining function parameters.

props.name: toolChoice
props.description: How the model should use tools.

props.name: parallelToolCalls
props.description: Allow model to call multiple tools simultaneously.

props.name: reasoningEffort
props.description: How hard reasoning models should think (not for grok-4).

props.name: memoryKey
props.description: Keep conversation history across runs.

categorize_text.description: Assign categories to input text based on custom or predefined labels.

props.name: text
props.description: Text content to categorize.

props.name: categories
props.description: Define the categories for classification.

props.name: name
props.description: Category name (e.g., "Positive", "Urgent", "Customer Support")

props.name: description
props.description: What this category represents

props.name: allowMultiple
props.description: Text can be assigned to multiple categories.

props.name: includeConfidence
props.description: Include confidence scores for each category.

props.name: customInstructions
props.description: Additional instructions for categorization.

props.name: enableContextSearch
props.description: Search for additional context to improve categorization.

props.name: reasoningEffort
props.description: How thoroughly to analyze the text.

extract_data_from_text.description: Extract structured data fields from unstructured text (e.g., names, addresses, dates).

props.name: text
props.description: Text to extract data from.

props.name: extractionPrompt
props.description: How to extract the data.

props.name: fields
props.description: Define the structured fields to extract from the text.

props.name: fieldName
props.description: Name of the field (e.g., "firstName", "email", "phoneNumber")

props.name: fieldDescription
props.description: What this field represents (e.g., "The person\

props.name: required
props.description: Must be present in extracted data.

props.name: enableContextSearch
props.description: Search for additional context to improve extraction.

props.name: strictExtraction
props.description: Only extract explicitly present information.

props.name: reasoningEffort
props.description: How thoroughly to analyze the text.

props.name: includeConfidence
props.description: Include confidence scores for extracted fields.

generate_image.description: Create images from text prompts using Grok\

props.name: prompt
props.description: Detailed description of the image you want to generate.

props.name: numberOfImages
props.description: Number of images to generate (1-10).

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: Format of the generated images.
